titleStmt.title: The coppy of a letter sent from Iohn Lord Finch, late Lord Keeper, to his friend Dr. Cozens with a commemoration of the favours Dr. Cozens shewed him in his vice-chancellorship : unto vvhich is annexed a good admonition to Protestants.
titleStmt.author: Finch of Fordwich, John Finch, Baron, 1584-1660.
Cosin, John, 1594-1672.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Thomason Collection, British Library.
"Good councel to Protestants" in verse: p. 5-6.
